mil5.3.12:1.2: ‘akkodhano vigatakhilohamasmi’ti, puna ca tathagato there sariputtamoggallane saparise panamesi, kim nu kho, bhante nagasena, tathagato kupito parisam panamesi, udahu tuttho panamesi, etam tava janahi imam namati?
mil5.3.12:1.3: Yadi, bhante nagasena, kupito parisam panamesi, tena hi tathagatassa kodho appativattito, yadi tuttho panamesi, tena hi avatthusmim ajanantena panamita.
mil5.3.12:1.4: Ayampi ubhato kotiko panho tavanuppatto, so taya nibbahitabbo”ti.
mil5.3.12:2.2: ‘akkodhano vigatakhilohamasmi’ti, panamita ca thera sariputtamoggallana saparisa, tanca pana na kopena.
mil5.3.12:2.3: Idha, maharaja, kocideva puriso mahapathaviya mule va khanuke va pasane va kathale va visame va bhumibhage khalitva patati, api nu kho, maharaja, mahapathavi kupita tam pateti”ti?
mil5.3.12:2.4: “Na hi, bhante, natthi mahapathaviya kopo va pasado va, anunayappatighavippamutta mahapathavi, sayameva so alaso khalitva patito”ti.
mil5.3.12:2.5: “Evameva kho, maharaja, natthi tathagatanam kopo va pasado va, anunayappatighavippamutta tathagata arahanto sammasambuddha, atha kho sayam kateneva te attano aparadhena panamita.
mil5.3.12:3.1: Idha pana, maharaja, mahasamuddo na matena kunapena samvasati, yam hoti mahasamudde matam kunapam, tam khippameva nicchubhati thalam ussareti.
mil5.3.12:3.2: Api nu kho, maharaja, mahasamuddo kupito tam kunapam nicchubhati”ti?
mil5.3.12:3.3: “Na hi, bhante, natthi mahasamuddassa kopo va pasado va, anunayappatighavippamutto mahasamuddo”ti.
mil5.3.12:3.4: “Evameva kho, maharaja, natthi tathagatanam kopo va pasado va, anunayappatighavippamutta tathagata arahanto sammasambuddha, atha kho sayam kateneva te attano aparadhena panamita.
mil5.3.12:4.1: Yatha, maharaja, pathaviya khalito patiyati, evam jinasasanavare khalito panamiyati.
mil5.3.12:4.2: Yatha, maharaja, samudde matam kunapam nicchubhiyati, evam jinasasanavare khalito panamiyati.
mil5.3.12:4.3: Yam pana te, maharaja, tathagato panamesi, tesam atthakamo hitakamo sukhakamo visuddhikamo ‘evam ime jatijarabyadhimaranehi parimuccissanti’ti—
